mapper.select: select order_no, order_type, create_time, order_amount, vip_time, remain_time, state, account_id,pay_type,user_phone from fqgj.pay_order where order_no = #{order_no}
select order_no, order_type, create_time, order_amount, vip_time, remain_time, state, account_id,pay_type,user_phone from fqgj.pay_order where account_id = #{account_id} order by create_time desc
select order_no, order_type, create_time, order_amount, vip_time, remain_time, state, account_id,pay_type,user_phone from fqgj.pay_order limit #{offset}, #{limit}
mapper.insert: insert into fqgj.pay_order(order_no,order_type, create_time, order_amount, vip_time, remain_time, state, account_id,pay_type,user_phone) values (#{order_no},#{order_type}, now(), #{order_amount}, #{vip_time}, #{remain_time}, #{state}, #{account_id}, #{pay_type}, #{user_phone})
mapper.update:
update fqgj.pay_order
order_type = #{order_type},
order_amount = #{order_amount},
vip_time = #{vip_time},
remain_time = #{remain_time},
state = #{state},
pay_type = #{pay_type},
user_phone = #{user_phone},
where order_no = #{order_no}
